name: Radioreum
description: Radioreum is an NFT audio platform streaming unique content (from DJs, Musicians, Comedians, and Podcasters) on the blockchain. Creatives in the entertainment industry can upload their audio files and mint them as NFTs, at the same time put them up for sale or auction on our platform. Our streaming platform allows their fans and supporters to listen to their work of art and purchase them via TheRadio DApp. Radioreum is available on the Ethereum Chain and Binance Smart Chain platforms.
